snippet: World number one Serena Williams was ruled out of her opening match at the Hopman Cup mixed team event in Perth on Monday because of inflammation of the knee, organizers said....
lead_paragraph: World number one Serena Williams was ruled out of her opening match at the Hopman Cup mixed team event in Perth on Monday because of inflammation of the knee, organizers said.

headline.print_headline: Hobbling Serena Ruled Out of Opening Hopman Cup Tie
headline.main: Hobbling Serena Ruled Out of Opening Hopman Cup Tie
